description: Whether you’re climbing, riding, or trekking by foot, Roark found a need for a durable, all around short that can withstand anything they threw at it. The new Explorer Long Road features an 18” outseam and is built from a durable T400 polyester blend with mechanical stretch. The oversized back pockets, and front leg cell pocket provide plenty of storage compared to a traditional walk short. Count on the Long Road as your everyday short or partner in crime for any demands life requires.
name: Roark Explorer Long Road Shorts, 18" Inseam - Mens
